remarks: Structure product composition operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
prdsbas.p $e |- P = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsbas.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
prdsbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
prdsbas.i $e |- ( ph -> dom R = I ) $.
prdshom.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` P ) $.
prdsco.o $e |- .xb = ( comp ` P ) $.
prdsco $p |- ( ph -> .xb = ( a e. ( B X. B ) , c e. B |-> ( d e. ( c H ( 2nd ` a ) ) , e e. ( H ` a ) |-> ( x e. I |-> ( ( d ` x ) ( <. ( ( 1st ` a ) ` x ) , ( ( 2nd ` a ) ` x ) >. ( comp ` ( R ` x ) ) ( c ` x ) ) ( e ` x ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B a c d e x $.
$d H a c d e $.
$d I a c d e x $.
$d P x $.
$d R a c d e x $.
$d S a c d e x $.
$d a c d e ph x $.
